bookableLocationId.title: bookableLocationId
bookableLocationId.description: The 18-character alphanumeric location Id of a specific bookable location chosen by the user. Use if the user has selected a bookable location; if blank, the action will return slots across broader filters like country.

country.title: country
country.description: The user's country for filtering locations, in ISO 3166 alpha-3 format (e.g., 'USA'). Use to broaden search if no bookableLocationId; combine with dates for regional slots—do not include state or sub-regions, as they are not supported and will error; if user mentions state, incorporate into conversation but pass only country here.

fromDate.title: fromDate
fromDate.description: The start date for searching slots, in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., '2025-07-19'). Must be a future date and before or equal to untilDate; if past or invalid, action may return empty—prompt user for future dates.

productId.title: productId
productId.description: The 18-character alphanumeric Product2 ID of the bookable product. Always confirm purchasability first with storeId; validate ID format before passing.

state.title: state
state.description: The state or province of the current user, used to find locations. Must use the state code appropriate for the input country. Eg Florida would be 'FL'

storeId.title: storeId
storeId.description: The 18-character alphanumeric ID of the current store from the messaging session (e.g., via Store__c). Required for all calls; if missing, set via GetStoreFromDomainName action first.

untilDate.title: untilDate
untilDate.description: The end date for searching slots, in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., '2025-08-19'). Must be a future date and after or equal to fromDate; extend range if no slots found.
